channel.title: Hi, there on Ben Mezger
channel.description: Recent content in Hi, there on Ben Mezger

item.title: Hello, org-mode and hugo
item.description: Hello, world! This is my first post here. This blog is created using Hugo and Emacs org-mode. I am still busy migrating my posts from Asciidoc to org-mode, so this should take a bit of time.

item.title: Notes
item.description: ‚ö†Ô∏è Some notes I wrote and some of them are snippets I copied around the Internet. Unfortunately I don‚Äôt have the source for all of them, but I will try to keep this updated. Notes that tagged or start with TODO are notes that or I am still working on or that are simply incomplete üòî I have discovered the reason for this code and it‚Äôs really quite necessary.
